caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. In a room, a man and his daughter encounter two other men who are reporting something to him. The man looks quite surprised but continues to listen. Outside, a cavalry unit is marching, led by a woman who is holding a shorter man in custody.Then, in a council chamber, a king is sitting alongside his advisors. The king makes a request, but one of the senior ministers opposes it. The king becomes very angry, and they argue for a long time. Eventually, the king dismisses the minister from the room. In his own chamber, the minister prepares to leave, and another person comes to see him, revealing some information.
